title: crafttweaker不能添加终极合成台配方
author: 小陈~
txt_content:
报错如下:

[ERROR] recipes.zs:55 > a method available but none matches the parameters (ZenTypeNative: crafttweaker.item.IItemStack, any[])
This is usually an error in your script, not in the mod
addShaped(string, ZenTypeNative: crafttweaker.item.IItemStack, ZenTypeNative: crafttweaker.item.IIngredient[][])


合成是这样写的:
mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped(<avaritia:infinity_sword>,[[null,null,null,null,null,null,null,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>],[null,null,null,null,null,null,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>],[null,null,null,null,null,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,null],[null,null,null,null,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,null,null],[null,<ore:blockCrystalMatrix>,null,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,null,null,null],[null,null,<ore:blockCrystalMatrix>,<ore:blockInfinity>,<ore:blockInfinity>,null,null,null,null],[null,null,<ore:blockCosmicNeutronium>,<ore:blockCrystalMatrix>,null,null,null,null,null],[null,<ore:blockCosmicNeutronium>,null,null,<ore:blockCrystalMatrix>,null,null,null,null],[<avaritia:skullfire_sword>,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null]]);

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
小陈~ 发表于 2018-8-6 11:40
没有任何报错可游戏没有添加此合成
mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped("recipe",,
[[null,          ...
推荐你用
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/extended-crafting这个mod来改无限贪婪剑的合成
无限贪婪1.12.2版本魔改总是出问题，这个mod也一样有3x3,5x5,7x7,9x9的合成台

replies.txt_content:
